name: feint-samples
description: Demos, examples, and games for Feint
author: Kenny Goff

scripts.arcade:brick-breaker: cd arcade/brick-breaker && haxe compile.hxml && open build/web/index.html
scripts.arcade:micro-shooter:watch: cd arcade/micro-shooter && haxe build.hxml && fswatch -o src | xargs -n1 -I{} haxe build.hxml
scripts.arcade:micro-shooter:serve: cd arcade/micro-shooter && parcel build/web/index.html -d build/web/parcel/output --cache-dir build/web/parcel/cache
scripts.benchmarks:overload: cd benchmarks/overload && haxe compile.hxml && browser-sync start -s --ss build/web -f build/web --no-notify --port 2000
scripts.showcase:forge-ecs: cd showcase/forge-ecs && haxe compile.hxml && open build/web/index.html
scripts.showcase:sprites: cd showcase/sprites && haxe compile.hxml && open build/web/index.html
scripts.snippets:hello-feint: cd snippets/hello-feint && haxe compile.hxml && open build/web/index.html
